channel.title: Zeawin Product Landing Page
channel.description: This is a product feed for Zeawin's Etsy shop.

item.g:title: Zeawin Wooden Salad and Toaster Tongs â€“ Crafted from durable beechwood with a sturdy stainless steel spring, these tongs make serving and handling food effortless. Designed for a secure grip, they're perfect for tossing salads, grabbing toast, or serving your favorite dishes with ease and style.
item.g:description: These beautifully handcrafted wooden toaster tongs, designed for effortless serving and cooking. Made from sustainable beechwood with an elegant design and smooth finish, each pair is coated with non-toxic mineral oil for a safe and natural touch. The sturdy stainless steel spring provides a strong grip, making it perfect for grabbing toast, tossing salads, and serving food with ease. Whether you're using them with a wooden salad bowl or as wooden food tongs for cooking, these tongs are a must-have for any kitchen!
